page.title: 18Pets and Toys in PAUNTLEY
page.content:
Pauntley has at least{103}cats,and{75 dogs. Horses, ponies, donkeys & goats account for{34}pets. There are{25}gold fish,{20}birds (including{12}hens), {2}pet mice,{1}hamster,{11}rabbits, {3}lambs,{4}terrapins,{1}tortoise and two households who have pe(s)t moles! The most exotic pet is an axolotl.
Cuddly toys, dolls and bicycles and outdoor toys are most popular. Toy cars, electric toys and construction toys are the next most popular. Two children mention "Star Wars" toys. A pram, a gun, jig-saw puzzles and a telephone are mentioned only once.
In school the most popular toys are the Wendy house, Lego, the sand pit and the computer.
